example

类 PagePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • example.PagePanel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    A Swing-based panel that displays a PDF page image. If the zoom tool is in use, allows the user to select a particular region of the image to be zoomed.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D clip
      the current clip, in device space
      (专用程序包) java.awt.Image currentImage
      The image of the rendered PDF page being displayed
      (专用程序包) PDFPage currentPage
      The current PDFPage that was rendered into currentImage
      (专用程序包) java.awt.geom.AffineTransform currentXform 
      (专用程序包) int downx
      x location of the mouse-down event
      (专用程序包) int downy
      y location of the mouse-down event
      (专用程序包) Flag flag
      a flag indicating whether the current page is done or not.
      (专用程序包) int offx
      The horizontal offset of the image from the left edge of the panel
      (专用程序包) int offy
      The vertical offset of the image from the top of the panel
      (专用程序包) java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D prevClip
      the clipping region used for the image
      (专用程序包) java.awt.Dimension prevSize
      the size of the image
      (专用程序包) boolean useZoom
      whether the zoom tool is enabled
      (专用程序包) java.awt.Rectangle zoomRect
      the zooming marquee

      构造器和说明

                  int y,
                  int width,
                  int height)
        Handles notification of the fact that some part of the image changed. Repaints that portion.
        指定者:
        imageUpdate 在接口中 java.awt.image.ImageObserver
        覆盖:
        imageUpdate 在类中 java.awt.Component
        返回:
        true if more updates are desired.

      • useZoomTool

        public void useZoomTool(boolean use)
        Turns the zoom tool on or off. If on, mouse drags will draw the zooming marquee. If off, mouse drags are ignored.

      • setClip

        public void setClip(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D clip)
        Set the desired clipping region (in screen coordinates), and redraw the image.

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt)
        Handles a mouseReleased event. If zooming is turned on and there's a valid zoom rectangle, set the image clip to the zoom rect.
        指定者:
        mouseReleased 在接口中 java.awt.event.MouseListener

      • mouseDragged

        public void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt)
        Handles a mouseDragged event. Constrains the zoom rect to the aspect ratio of the panel unless the shift key is down.
        指定者:
        mouseDragged 在接口中 java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
